SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.DIARY_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Manage your diary entry types to categorize your travel experiences
SETTINGS.COUNTRIES_DESCRIPTION: Manage the countries you want to visit or have visited
SETTINGS.WEATHERS_DESCRIPTION: Manage weather conditions you might encounter during your trips
SETTINGS.SPORTS_DESCRIPTION: Manage sports and activities you can practice during your travels
SETTINGS.ACCOMMODATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Manage types of accommodations for your trips
SETTINGS.TRANSPORTATION_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Manage transportation methods for your journeys
SETTINGS.LOCATIONS_DESCRIPTION: View and manage locations created from your trips
SETTINGS.POIS_DESCRIPTION: View and manage points of interest from your trips

PHOTO_UPLOAD.TITLE: Create Trip from Photos
PHOTO_UPLOAD.DRAG_DROP_SUBTITLE: or click to browse your files
PHOTO_UPLOAD.DRAG_DROP_HINT: Upload photos with GPS and date metadata for automatic trip creation
PHOTO_UPLOAD.SUPPORTED_FORMATS: Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, HEIC (max 10MB each)
PHOTO_UPLOAD.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your trip has been created with {{count}} photo
PHOTO_UPLOAD.SUCCESS_MESSAGE_plural: Your trip has been created with {{count}} photos

VALIDATION_ERRORS.INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid file format. Only JPEG, PNG, and HEIC are supported.
VALIDATION_ERRORS.FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
VALIDATION_ERRORS.NO_DATE_METADATA: Photo is missing date information. Cannot create trip without dates.
VALIDATION_ERRORS.NO_GPS_METADATA: Some photos are missing GPS data. Please provide a location.
VALIDATION_ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
VALIDATION_ERRORS.SERVER_ERROR: Server error. Please try again later.
VALIDATION_ERRORS.RATE_LIMIT: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
VALIDATION_ERRORS.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

LOCATION_PICKER.TITLE: Select Location
LOCATION_PICKER.WARNING_MESSAGE: {{count}} out of {{total}} photo is missing GPS coordinates.
LOCATION_PICKER.WARNING_MESSAGE_plural: {{count}} out of {{total}} photos are missing GPS coordinates.
LOCATION_PICKER.WARNING_INSTRUCTION: Please select a country and optionally a city to assign to photos without location data.
LOCATION_PICKER.COORDINATES_INFO: Coordinates will be automatically filled based on the selected country, but you can edit them if needed.
LOCATION_PICKER.COORDINATES_HINT: These coordinates will be used for photos without GPS data.

GENERAL.NO_TRIPS: No trips yet. Create your first adventure!

HERO.SUBTITLE: Record every adventure, count your flights, mark the countries you've visited and keep your travel diaries in one place. Relive your memories whenever you want.

FEATURES.LABEL: Features
FEATURES.TITLE: Everything you need to preserve your adventures
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: From your first flight to your last diary entry, TripCoaster accompanies you every step of the way.
FEATURES.COUNTRY_MAP_DESC: Visualize on an interactive map all the countries you've visited. Track your progress and plan your next destination.
FEATURES.FLIGHT_COUNTER_DESC: Keep track of all your flights: hours in the air, airlines, favorite routes and kilometers traveled.
FEATURES.TRAVEL_DIARY_DESC: Write your experiences, anecdotes and reflections from each trip. Your private adventure blog.
FEATURES.PHOTO_GALLERY_DESC: Organize your best photos by trip, destination or date. Relive every moment with your favorite images.
FEATURES.ROUTES_DESC: Save the routes you've taken, the secret places you discovered and the restaurants you can't miss.
FEATURES.STATS_DESC: Discover patterns in your travels: your favorite month to travel, the most visited continent and much more.

MAP.LABEL: Your world map
MAP.TITLE: Every country you visit lights up
MAP.SUBTITLE: Visualize your adventures on an interactive map. Watch how your world fills with color with each new destination.
MAP.PROGRESS_DESC: You've visited 12 of 195 recognized countries. Your next goal: 15 countries!

GALLERY.LABEL: Gallery
GALLERY.TITLE: Memories worth keeping
GALLERY.SUBTITLE: Your travelers share the most incredible moments from all corners of the world.

STEPS.LABEL: How it works
STEPS.TITLE: Start documenting in 4 steps
STEPS.CREATE_ACCOUNT_DESC: Sign up for free in seconds and customize your traveler profile.
STEPS.REGISTER_TRIPS_DESC: Add your destinations, dates, flights and notes from each adventure.
STEPS.WATCH_MAP_DESC: See how visited countries light up on your personal map.
STEPS.SHARE_DESC: Keep your diaries private or share them with friends and family.

TESTIMONIALS.LABEL: Testimonials
TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: What our travelers say
TESTIMONIALS.T1_QUOTE: TripCoaster changed the way I document my travels. Before I used notebooks that I lost, now everything is in one place and I can relive it whenever I want.
TESTIMONIALS.T2_QUOTE: The flight counter is incredible. I didn't know I had accumulated more than 200 hours in the air until I started using TripCoaster. The statistics are addictive.
TESTIMONIALS.T3_QUOTE: The photo gallery organized by trip is exactly what I needed. It's like having a professional photo album for every adventure.

CTA.SUBTITLE: Join thousands of travelers who are already documenting their adventures. Free forever, no limits.
CTA.DISCLAIMER: No credit card required. Setup in 30 seconds.

FOOTER.TAGLINE: Your digital travel companion. Document, remember and share every adventure.
